summary: An ordinance providing for the manner of advertising and receiving bids for bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of Four Hundred Thousand ($400,000) Dollars, voted at election held in said city November 8, 1910, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 25009; and in the sum of One Hundred Twenty-five Thousand ($125,000) Dollars voted at an election held in said city March 5, 1912, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 28799; and in the sum of One Hundred Thousand ($100,000) Dollars, voted at election held in said city, March 7, 1911 under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 26069.
